title: DJI Mavic 2 Pro Drone - Gray
description: Pre-owned DJI Mavic 2 Pro Drone in gray. Renowned for its Hasselblad camera, 1-inch CMOS sensor, and advanced obstacle sensing. Delivers stunning 4K video and high-resolution photos. Includes remote controller, intelligent flight battery, charger, propellers, and carrying case. Fully tested and in excellent working condition with light cosmetic wear.

reviews.author: David Thompson
reviews.title: Best drone I've ever flown
reviews.content: The DJI Mavic 2 Pro is absolutely incredible. The camera quality is stunning and the flight controls are super smooth. Obstacle avoidance works flawlessly and battery life is impressive. Worth every penny for aerial photography!

reviews.author: Lisa Park
reviews.title: Great drone, minor wear
reviews.content: Excellent image quality and flight performance as expected from DJI. There's some light wear on the body but nothing major. It works perfectly and the carrying case is a nice touch. Great value for a premium drone.

meta.title: DJI Mavic 2 Pro Drone - Gray

meta.keywords: DJI Mavic 2 Pro, drone, 4K camera drone, used drone, DJI, aerial photography, HappyDeel
